attributes.action: take all steps necessary to ensure that the Bedford Western Bypass is completed by end 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Bedford Western Bypass will link the existing Southern Bypass (A421) with the A428 and the A6 thereby allowing traffic to avoid the already congested (and polluted) town centre. This will shorten journey times, reduce pollution and improve the environment of this Ancient Market Town.
